output.sentences: The graduating members of the high school band played a song they prepared for the Graduation Ceremony
His girlfriend straightened out his Mortarboard.
He waited in anticipation as the valedictorians were called up, one by one.
His parents filmed him from the audience as he went up.
He smiled ear to ear as 4 long years of hard work were finally rewarded.
